TextLibrary.Text: So the contact I met with is associated with a branch of the MRI led by the eccentric billionaire Nasty Butler.
So the contact I met with is associated with a branch of the MRI led by the eccentric billionaire Nasty Butler.
Nasty Butler? I assume there is some kind of story behind that name, right?
Nasty Butler? I assume there is some kind of story behind that name, right?
Anyway, he wants us to test out some strange Psionic Weaponry they've developed. It's useable only by telepaths, hence why he met with me.
Anyway, he wants us to test out some strange Psionic Weaponry they've developed. It's useable only by telepaths, hence why he met with me. Well, that and you smell bad.
Let me guess, he's not just going to hand over their newly developed weaponry for free, is he?
I'm going to pretend I didn't hear that. Let me guess, he's not just going to hand over their newly developed weaponry for free, is he?

I don't know the price, but I do know they want us to prove ourselves. They've allowed a certain Pirate Steve to escape from his detention cell on Serpens III and they want us to take him out to prove our combat skills.

I don't know the price, but I do know they want us to prove ourselves. They've allowed a certain Pirate Steve to escape from his detention cell on Serpens III and they want us to take him out to prove our combat skills.
A single pirate escaped into space, and all we're given to find him is the name Steve?
A single pirate escaped into space, and all we're given to find him is the name Steve? What kind of name is Steve, anyway? I mean. . Steve?
Actually, he's been tagged with a tracking beacon and I've already had ED load his coordinates into our navigation computer.
Hey! My father was named Steve. It happens to be a royal name dating back to the King of Corneria! Anyway, this pirate was tagged with a tracking beacon. He'll be no trouble to locate.
